select , GROUP_CONCAT(r.role_name SEPARATOR '-') AS roleName, GROUP_CONCAT(r.id ) AS roleIdsStr FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id
u.is_valid = 1
and u.user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and u.true_name like concat('%',#{trueName},'%')
and u.email like concat('%',#{email},'%')
and u.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
GROUP BY u.id
